video_title: Top 5 Things Someone With Depression Wants You To Know | Dr Julie #shorts
transcript:
i'm a psychologist and here's the top
five things that someone with depression
wants you to know number five depression
is not a choice and they can't just snap
out of it
number four when they take days to
answer a text or keep cancelling plans
at the last minute it's nothing you did
wrong their conflict is not with you
it's with themselves
and number three the reasons for
depression can't always be seen but not
knowing the reason does not make that
depression any less valid
number two you might think that person
is not trying hard enough but that's
because when you're depressed even the
simplest of tasks can feel like a
mountain to climb
and number one they're still the same
person but they're going through hell
right now and they may need you more
than ever
